reviewText: My favorite movie of all times.

i love this movie . have watched it several times now . you will need region free . zone free dvd player to watch this version of this movie . i could not get this movie in U.S.A. format . it is worth it though . it was to me anyway . great movie .
The movie is great. I did, however, have to buy a universal DVD player in order  to watch it.

A perfectly good b+ grade romcom/drama starring likeable people, even though some are pretty rough.  The romantic leads are very good with good chemistry.  The plot is a little bit forced, but I thought it was pretty original.  Too bad it's not in a U.S. format.  It was filmed in the USA, so what's with the Australian connection.  I saw it on The Movie Channel Extra on dish t.v. and this is the first time I got a response on Amazon at all.  I hope they will find the U.S. appropriate version and make it available.
